name: The Gothic Throne
description:
Welcome!  This is Gothic Throne, my first publicly released game.  It's still very early on, but I feel like it's a pretty compelling base game to build off of, and gain feedback from.

Controls:

WASD to move

Left Mouse to attack

Right Mouse to use special ability

   - Weapons take different amounts of energy in order to use their special

Credits

16x16 Dungeon Tileset - https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

swoosh effect - https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/394446/
level 1 music - https://opengameart.org/content/pulsar-famitracker-2a03
stab sfx - https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/413496/

Menu Music: Eric Skiff - Underclocked - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music

In-game music: Jonathan So - Sunstrider - Audio Pack - Availiable at https://jonathan-so.itch.io/creatorpack
